member.summary: Calculate the best emission data by location for a specified time period.

member.summary: Maps user input query parameters to props dictionary for use with the data sources current forecast method.

member.param: Dictionary of properties to call plugin.
member.returns: Result of the plugin call or resulting status response

member.summary: Gets sci-score value, currently dummy function to keep consistency
member.param: input from JSON request converted to input object with location and time interval
member.returns: Result of the call to the aggregator that calculates the sci score
